attributes.action: Instigate emergency regulations under the Civil Contingencies Act 2004 in response to the riots.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for the government to instigate emergency regulations under the Civil Contingencies Act 2004 in response to the August 2011 riots which are taking place throughout the United Kingdom.

The police are failing to control the present situation and this petition is calling on parliament to consider this option.
